basic.floral_language:
Orostachys boehmeri
Floriography: strong, glorious, calm
Orostachys boehmeri is a beautiful plant with gray-green to blue-green thin leaves tightly arranged in a rosette. Has a strong reproductive capacity by lateral buds. With adequate light, the plant become compact, like a blossoming rose, has high ornamental value and favored by the public.
Likes sunny days, shade properly under summer strong light, dormant in winter. The plant usually dies after flowering, should cut the flower buds.
basic.color: Leaf color gray green to blue green

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate light, dormant in winter, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, less water to avoid overgrowing
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once every 1-2 months
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
